Gumdrop
  • All Classes
 

Uses of Package
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http

  • Packages that use org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http 
    Package Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http
    HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2 server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.client
    Non-blocking HTTP client with an event-driven handler pattern.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.file
    Static file serving for the HTTP server.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.hpack
    HPACK header compression for HTTP/2.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.websocket
    WebSocket protocol implementation (RFC 6455).
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet
    Servlet 4.0 container implementation.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http 
    Class Description
    Header
    An HTTP header.
    Headers
    A collection of HTTP headers with convenience methods for header access.
    HTTPAuthenticationProvider
    Abstract base class for HTTP authentication providers.
    HTTPAuthenticationProvider.AuthenticationResult
    Authentication result containing outcome and principal information.
    HTTPConnection
    Connection handler for the HTTP protocol.
    HTTPRequestHandler
    Handler for HTTP request events on a single stream.
    HTTPRequestHandlerFactory
    Factory for creating HTTPRequestHandler instances.
    HTTPResponseState
    State interface for sending an HTTP response.
    HTTPServer
    Connection factory for HTTP connections on a given port.
    HTTPServerMetrics
    OpenTelemetry metrics for HTTP servers.
    HTTPStatus
    Symbolic enumeration of HTTP status codes.
    HTTPVersion
    Enum of possible HTTP versions.
    StreamPriorityTree
    Manages HTTP/2 stream priority dependency tree for optimal resource allocation.
    StreamPriorityTree.PriorityNode
    Priority node representing a stream in the dependency tree.
    WebSocketEventHandler
    Handler for WebSocket lifecycle events.
    WebSocketSession
    A WebSocket session for sending messages to the peer.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.client 
    Class Description
    Headers
    A collection of HTTP headers with convenience methods for header access.
    HTTPStatus
    Symbolic enumeration of HTTP status codes.
    HTTPVersion
    Enum of possible HTTP versions.
